mapper.select: select u.username "u_username", u.nickname "nickname", u.email "email", u.phone "phone", a.address_name "address_name", a.address_detail "address_detail", a.address "address", a.postcode "postcode", p.id "p_id" from address a, `user` u, product p WHERE u.username = a.user_id AND u.username = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sales (u_username, p_id, amount, address, address_detail, postcode, deliveryreq, tracknum) VALUES #{u_username}, #{p_id}, #{amount}, #{address}, #{address_detail}, #{postcode}, #{deliveryreq}, #{tracknum}
mapper.select: SELECT amount, address, address_detail, postcode, deliveryreq, tracknum FROM sales WHERE u.username = #{username}
